attributes.action: Increase the retirement age to 76 for both sexes, for both the public and private sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's unthinkable that people can retire when they are just 65. Meanwhile, because the populace is aging, our workforce will shrink by 7 million people by 2042 if we do nothing. Please increase the retirement age.
